decisions.description: Checks for both conditions - With Or Without Opportunity
decisions.name: Active_Sales_User_Check
decisions.label: Active Sales User Check

rules.name: Active_Sales_User
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7) OR (7 AND 8 AND 9)
rules.label: Active Sales User

decisions.description: Legacy, Initial, Recurring, Renewal, Monthly or Undetermined

decisions.description: Initial Commissionable, Recurring Commissionable - Payroll, Recurring Commissionable - Bookkeeping, Monthly Commission

decisions.label: Product and Payment Type Check

rules.name: No_Opp_and_No_Rep
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND ((5 OR 6 OR 7) OR (8 OR 9))
rules.label: No Opp and No Rep
